enb_long_title: Thirty-second Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC)
sentences: In its decision, the IPCC: noted the IAC Review recommendation that the IPCC establish an executive committee; agreed to work toward establishing a formal body to provide governance functions between panel sessions, strengthen coordination, and oversee administration and communication according to the mandate to be agreed at IPCC-33; asked the task group to consider options concerning establishment of an executive committee, including the mandate, size, composition and functions of the body; and requested the task group to make recommendations on the options at IPCC-33 with a view to taking a decision.
